## PHQ-9 vs DTC

Harmony is an innovative tool specially designed for researchers in psychology, making their task of item harmonisation between questionnaires significantly more manageable, even when these are in different languages. A perfect example of a harmonisation process can be done through the comparison of PHQ-9 vs DTC. These two widely used psychological evaluation tools can be matched against each other using Harmony's powerful natural language processing and generative AI models, providing a percentage match between each corresponding item. # Using Harmony for PHQ-9 vs DTC Harmonisation When comparing PHQ-9 vs DTC, Harmony makes the process a breeze. Researchers can either select the PHQ-9 and DTC instruments from Harmony's comprehensive database or upload their own versions in PDF form. The tool matches the items in these questionnaires and provides a detailed comparison report. Harmony's AI models can identify potential correlations in the language, context, and meaning of the items, allowing researchers to make meaningful comparisons across studies. # PHQ-9 vs DTC: Addressing Global Research Needs Harmony's capacity for multi-language processing significantly expands the scope of the PHQ-9 vs DTC comparison. Regardless of whether the PHQ-9 and DTC questionnaires are in the same language or not, Harmony can facilitate a detailed comparison and consistently provide accurate results. This not only helps to streamline longitudinal analyses across varying studies but also contributes to the global reach of composite mental health research. By using Harmony for the PHQ-9 vs DTC comparison, international researchers can further investigate the consistency, variability, and effects of changing social conditions on mental health.

## Compare the items in PHQ-9 and DTC

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import PHQ-9 and DTC into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just PHQ-9 into Harmony</a> - compare PHQ-9 with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just DTC into Harmony</a> - compare DTC with other instruments
